info.name: Menu App API
info.description: Complete API collection for Menu Application with Session Token and API Key authentication

item.name: Developer Endpoints (API Key)
item.description: Endpoints for developers to manage admins directly using API Key

request.description: Get list of all admins (passwords excluded)
Get specific admin details by ID (password excluded)
Create a new admin with all fields
Direct admin modification (developer only). No password verification required. Any field in body will be updated directly.
Delete admin and ALL associated lists and menu items

item.name: Admin User Endpoints (Session Token)
item.description: Endpoints for admin users to manage their own data using Session Token

exec: // Auto-save session token to environment variable

request.description: Login and get session token (auto-saved to environment)
Update your own profile. Requires session token. Can only edit your own data.
Get all lists for current admin
Create a new list (requires session token and ownership)
Delete list and all its items (ownership verified)
Get all menu items (optionally filtered by list)
Create menu item with optional multi-line description
Get public admin data by username (for menu pages). Returns admin data without password.
